property.name: build.make.arguments
property.value: SRCDIR=${module.src.dir} GSOAP_LOCATION=${with.gsoap.prefix} GSOAP_VERSION=_gsoap_${ext.gsoap.version} GLOBUS_LOCATION=${with.globus.prefix} OS=${ext.gsoap.platform} GLOBUS_FLAVOUR=${with.globus.dbg.nothr.flavor} GLOBUS_FLAVOUR_PTHR=${with.globus.dbg.thr.flavor} USE_VOMS=yes VOMS_LOCATION=${stage.abs.dir}
